description:
Dad is told he cannot drink alcohol for a while upon having his wisdom teeth removed. He inches ever so close to giving into temptation, each time being reprimanded by Mom, Bunji, and Fumi. Once again, the spirit of early education appears to Mom as she worries about Bunji`s school issues. Then suddenly, the peculiar "spirit of relaxed education" appears! Taka, Mom`s friend as a little girl, appears. He looks like a run-of-the-mill businessman, but has a certain kindness to him. He accompanies him on the way to karate class, and suddenly busts into a demonstration!  The mothers are having tea. It turns into a discussion about their children, and Mom goes off on a rant about hers. Dad returns and goes into a talk about the second child, e.g. Fumi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No Alcohol / Relax / A Guy`s Back / Photograph
禁酒 / ゆとり / 男の背中 / 写真
